name: SURV: Raft Crafting Survival
description:
Judgement Day has finally come and the world will never be the same again. Civilization is on the brink of extinction.

But our hero survived! With no home, no weapons, and no pants. He will have to survive fighting mutants, monsters, zombies and other survivors. He will have to deal with all types of anomalies...

SURV is a new approach to the popular free-to-play Survival RPG games.

Craft the best gear
A ton of recipes. Collect resources and necessary objects, craft and upgrade your unique gear tuning, and make your hero one of a kind thanks to the variety of armour and weapons.
Bats, brass knuckles, reinforced armour, rucksacks, swords - find anything you need!

Upgrade your character
You will need to be the strongest to survive. Improve your health, upgrade your attack skills, speed and characteristics.
Never ending upgrades! Never stop perfecting yourself!

Post-apocalyptic adventure
Heaths are waiting for you, Stalker! Explore over 25 different locations that are full of adventure, danger and rare artifacts!

Fight for resources
Simple but engrossing battle structure. Fight mutants and other players in PvP mode. Become the strongest of survivors.

Become part of a squad
And be the most influential group among all! Clan events and worthy rewards are waiting for you!

No sleep!
Even if the game is closed your hero continues to survive. But don't let him sleep - nothing good will come of it!
As soon as you are back, you can get all of the collected resources.

Auto-Renewal Subscription.
"Scout" - No ads - 1 month.
"Ranger" - No ads, Partial sale, Keys, Flasks - 1 month.
"Stalker" - "Ranger" + mask, chest, double nails, badge - 3 months.
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
